description: Revised guidelines say children under 10 do not transmit the virus, but some experts express caution.
title: Coronavirus: Switzerland says young children can hug grandparents
title_page: Coronavirus: Switzerland says young children can hug grandparents - BBC News
maintext: Dr Koch said that many grandparents "live to see their grandchildren" and that it was important for their mental health. He said it was not the children who posed a risk to elderly relatives but their parents.
